abilities.description:
Your countermeasure array is armed with 3 chaff. If you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.703964b8d02355b8]{Resupply} in a place where your countermeasures can be replenished, you may exchange any earned +supply for +chaff.

When a threat attacks while they have a sensor lock on you and you React Under Fire, you may fire chaff in an attempt to throw off their targeting matrix. If you do, suffer -1 chaff and treat a weak hit as a strong hit.
